    left = (empty + full) % capacity
    while n + left >= capacity:
        n += left // capacity
        left = (left % capacity) + (left // capacity)
    print(n)

def check_valid(a,b,c):
    if a + b > c and b + c > a and c + a > b:
        return True
    else:
        return False

def area(a,b,c):
    s = (a + b + c)/2
    return (s*(s-a)*(s-b)*(s-c))**0.5
